scripts.setup: git config submodule.recurse true && git submodule update && node ./hosting/scripts/setup.js && yarn && yarn bootstrap && yarn build && yarn dev
scripts.build:dev: lerna run --stream prebuild && yarn nx run-many --target=build --output-style=dynamic --watch --preserveWatchOutput
scripts.restore: yarn run clean && yarn run bootstrap && yarn run build
scripts.nuke: yarn run nuke:packages && yarn run nuke:docker
scripts.kill-all: yarn run kill-builder && yarn run kill-server
scripts.dev: yarn run kill-all && lerna link && lerna run --stream --parallel dev:builder --concurrency 1 --stream
scripts.dev:noserver: yarn run kill-builder && lerna link && lerna run --stream dev:stack:up && lerna run --stream --parallel dev:builder --concurrency 1 --ignore @budibase/backend-core --ignore @budibase/server --ignore @budibase/worker
scripts.dev:server: yarn run kill-server && lerna run --stream --parallel dev:builder --concurrency 1 --scope @budibase/backend-core --scope @budibase/worker --scope @budibase/server
scripts.dev:built: cd packages/server && yarn dev:stack:up && cd ../../ && lerna run --stream --parallel dev:built
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:eslint && yarn run lint:prettier
scripts.lint:fix: yarn run lint:fix:prettier && yarn run lint:fix:eslint
scripts.build:docker: lerna run --stream build:docker && npm run build:docker:proxy && cd hosting/scripts/linux/ && ./release-to-docker-hub.sh $BUDIBASE_RELEASE_VERSION && cd -
scripts.build:docker:pre: lerna run --stream build && lerna run --stream predocker
scripts.build:docker:selfhost: lerna run --stream build:docker && cd hosting/scripts/linux/ && ./release-to-docker-hub.sh latest && cd -
scripts.build:docker:develop: node scripts/pinVersions && lerna run --stream build:docker && npm run build:docker:proxy && cd hosting/scripts/linux/ && ./release-to-docker-hub.sh develop && cd -
scripts.build:docker:single:multiarch: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 -f hosting/single/Dockerfile -t budibase:latest .
scripts.build:docker:single: npm run build:docker:pre && npm run build:docker:single:image
scripts.publish:docker:couch: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 -f hosting/couchdb/Dockerfile -t budibase/couchdb:latest -t budibase/couchdb:v3.2.1 --push ./hosting/couchdb
scripts.publish:docker:dependencies: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64,linux/amd64 -f hosting/dependencies/Dockerfile -t budibase/dependencies:latest -t budibase/dependencies:v3.2.1 --push ./hosting
scripts.mode:self: yarn env:selfhost:enable && yarn env:multi:disable && yarn env:account:disable
scripts.mode:cloud: yarn env:selfhost:disable && yarn env:multi:enable && yarn env:account:disable
scripts.submodules:load: git submodule init && git submodule update && yarn && yarn bootstrap
scripts.submodules:unload: git submodule deinit --all && yarn && yarn bootstrap
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && git push && echo "Successfully pushed version and tag $npm_package_version!"
